name: flutter-upload-aab-googleplay
description: Upload AAB file to Google Play using fastlane. Using command `fastlane supply`. Required data for the task: AAB file, JSON key file, package name. JSON key file can be created in the Google Play Console. Link to the API access section: https://play.google.com/console/u/0/developers/api-access
helpMarkDown: Upload AAB file to Google Play using fastlane. Required data for the task: AAB file, JSON key file, package name. JSON key file can be created in the Google Play Console. Link to the API access section: https://play.google.com/console/u/0/developers/api-access
author: Andrii Petrovskyi

inputs.name: aabFile
inputs.label: AAB file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the AAB file to upload.

inputs.name: keyFile
inputs.label: JSON key file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the JSON key file. The key file is used to authenticate with the Google Play Console.

inputs.name: packageId
inputs.label: Package ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Package ID from the Google Play Console. Can be found in the App details section. Link to the App details section: https://play.google.com/console/u/0/developers/app/your.package.name/app-details

inputs.name: track
inputs.label: Track
inputs.helpMarkDown: Track to upload the AAB file. Can be `internal`, `alpha`, `beta`, `production`. More about in fastlane supply: https://docs.fastlane.tools/actions/supply/
